snippet: The arrest of Lee Sang-deuk on charges of taking bribes from two bankers further weakens a lame-duck president already struggling with recent setbacks.
abstract: Lee Sang-deuk, elder brother of Korean Pres Lee Myung-bak, is arrested on bribery charges; arrest represents a further blow to the political leverage of Pres Lee, a lame-duck leader already grappling with setbacks in both domestic politics and foreign policy.
lead_paragraph: The arrest of Lee Sang-deuk on charges of taking bribes from two bankers further weakens a lame-duck president already struggling with recent setbacks.

headline.seo: South Korean President’s Brother Accused of Bribery
headline.main: Brother of South Korean President Is Charged With Bribery
headline.print_headline: Brother of South Korean President Is Charged With Bribery
